title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Online Course Development and Operation Based on IMS Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational language learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design two or more online course modules using the IMS Learning Design template
Learners improve learning efficiency by 20% or more by modifying and applying template-based course content in an LMS environment
Learners apply at least three interaction strategies, including asynchronous discussions and multimedia integration
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
